named-native-query.name: usersSearchPriority
named-native-query.query: select user_id, name, priority, url_icon from (select rownum n, t.* from( SELECT user_id, name, priority, url_icon FROM External_User WHERE priority=:priority)t ) where n>=:MIN_VAL AND n <= :MAX_VAL

named-native-query.name: usersCountByPerSelectionCriteria
named-native-query.query: SELECT count(*) FROM External_User WHERE priority=:priority
